meanings.definition: A person who makes and repairs locks.
meanings.sent1: The locksmiths fixed the broken lock on my front door.
meanings.sent2: I called the locksmiths to help me when I lost my house key.
meanings.sent3: The locksmiths joked that they hold the 'key' to everyone's problems.
meanings.sent4: The locksmiths are like the gatekeepers of our security, ensuring our safety.
meanings.sent5: The locksmiths skillfully crafted a new lock for the old wooden chest.

meanings.definition: A professional who installs and opens locks.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor hired locksmiths to install a high-security lock on their safe.
meanings.sent2: The locksmiths arrived promptly to help me unlock my car after I accidentally locked my keys inside.
meanings.sent3: The locksmiths play a crucial role in keeping our belongings safe and secure.
meanings.sent4: The locksmiths have the magical ability to turn a locked door into an open pathway.
meanings.sent5: The locksmiths carefully examined the intricate mechanism of the lock before opening it.
